attributes.action: Remove Russia from the Visa and Mastercard payment system
attributes.additional_details: An additional sanction that will not only affect business but individuals as well
attributes.background: Prevent Russian payments using these systems that are routed through the UK

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to the issuing and use of Visa and Mastercard credit cards is a matter for Visa and Mastercard, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

In any case, you might be interested to know that Visa and Mastercard have announced they have blocked certain Russian institutions from using their network. You can find out more about this here: https://www.reuters.com/business/mastercard-blocks-multiple-russian-financial-institutions-network-2022-03-01/

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

'Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
